title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, June 25, 2021
description: Today would have been the 92nd birthday of Eric Carle, author of “The Very Hungry Caterpillar” and many other children’s books. He died May 23, 2021.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today would have been the 92nd birthday of Eric Carle, author of “The Very Hungry Caterpillar” and many other children’s books. He died May 23, 2021.
